reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Community development in the Andean region

description.narrative: The project will strengthen food security of the Bolivian indigenous peoples and empower women to participate in the development of their communities and strengthen the livelihood of their families through small-scale income generating activities. The work is implemented in Aymara and Quetzua communities in the Andean highlands where food security is weak and health problems are many. The project will improve and diversify the nutritive condition of the families by establishing greenhouses; develop the arti sanal skills of women and help them to find new marketing channels. In addition, leadership training will be organized for women. The beneficiaries of the project are the inhabitants of the project communities, especially women. The implementing agency is the Bolivian Evangelical Lutheran Church, established in 1939, whose members are mainly Aymaras, Quetzuas and Guaranis.
